participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Creative, outgoing, and passionate about music.
participant_1.background: I remember buying my first house with my husband. I love cold weather. My favorite brand of clothing is Donna Karen. I have a bad back from years of standing on my feet all day. I'm a drummer in an indie band.

participant_2.name: Ahmed
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic, supportive, and eager to help others.
participant_2.background: I am happy with my casual style that is easy to keep up with a long commute. I can speak Arabic, English, and French. I want to learn how to use technology in the classroom to engage my students and help them learn better. I go to a local college. I think it's really cool that I can use my skills to help people in need.

content.text: Not much, just getting ready for the week ahead.
Nice! What are you looking forward to?
I just started a new job and I'm going to meet some of my co-workers for lunch.
Oh fun! How do you like your new job so far?
It's going well, it's a lot of work but it's also really interesting.
I'm a teacher, I teach English to ESL students.
Oh that's awesome! I used to teach ESL too.
Really? That's so cool! What did you like about it?
I loved working with students and helping them learn a new language.
Me too! It's so rewarding to see them progress.
What's the best thing about your new job?
I'm really excited to be able to use technology in the classroom.
That's awesome! I think technology can be really helpful in the classroom.
Me too! I think it can help students learn better and it can also make the classroom more fun.
Yeah, I think so too. I'm glad you're excited about your new job!
Thanks! I'm really happy to be here.
